blood.post: Tabor may be onto something concrete, but it needs the critical test of time and the critique of his peers.  He does operate in the area of probability and needs more evidence to convince us.  His claim that Paul “invented” Baptism and the Eucharist should almost be considered heresy.But then again,……………..????????????
blood.title: James D. Tabor Taken Aback:  Claims About the Shroud Blood X and Y Chromosomes
